name: Powder Barrel - Naughty Robots Early Concept
name_original: Powder Barrel - Naughty Robots Early Concept
description:
Super Early version of a game I'm working on (Naughty Robots).  Name got changed, obviously.

This demo contains just one level.  Collect coins and look for secrets.  I forgot what the maximum score is.  But it doesn't matter...you'll find them all ;)

This is my first bigger game.  Whenever you get around to play Naughty Robots, you'll see how much got updated.

NOTE: I do not have the working files for this anymore, somehow.  So there won't be any updates or fixes of any kind.
